sentences: Rena Uehara (上原 れな, Uehara Rena, born August 12, 1986) is a female Japanese singer-songwriter originally from Hyogo, Japan and now residing in Osaka.
She has also done the opening for White Album 2, Todokanai Koi '13.
On December 28, 2015, she had announced that she will go hiatus to treat her voice because she was diagnosed with psychogenic disphonia.
Todokanai Koi '13 (届かない恋 '13), released November 6, 2013
